HERO.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to the origins of bottomless harmony, where every thread of time is interwoven with skill, and transformation becomes a work of art.

ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to Shakirovna Beauty Center, where your beauty and wellness are our top priorities. Our salon offers a serene and luxurious environment where you can unwind and indulge in a range of top-notch beauty services. From personalized skincare treatments and professional hair care to exquisite nail services and relaxing body treatments, our experienced team is dedicated to helping you look and feel your absolute best. Discover the ultimate beauty experience at Shakirovna Beauty Center - where elegance meets excellence.

SPECIALS.FOOTER_TEXT: Don't miss out on our limited-time luxury indulgences.

ONE_TO_TRY.CANDLES_DESCRIPTION: Introducing Shakirovna Scented Candles, where luxury meets tranquility. Crafted with premium natural wax and exquisite fragrance oils, our candles offer a clean, long-lasting burn that fills your space with captivating scents. Choose from a range of signature aromas designed to refresh your mind and create a serene ambience in any room. Elevate your self-care experience with Shakirovna Scented Candles: the perfect blend of elegance and relaxation.

PARTNERS.MOLODOST_DESCRIPTION: Step into the vibrant atmosphere of MOLODOST RESTAURANT & KARAOKE CLUB, Dubai's premier destination where fine dining meets unforgettable entertainment.
PARTNERS.STATUS67_DESCRIPTION: Status67 Auto Repair is Dubai's premier destination for luxury automotive care, specializing in high-end brands like Porsche, Bentley, Aston Martin, and McLaren.
PARTNERS.YOY_DESCRIPTION: Chef Yuriy Kovryzhenko and restaurateur Pavlo Moroz‚Äîtwo passionate creators‚Äîhave joined forces to redefine what a bistro can be. At YOY Neo Bistro, we blend cultures, flavors, and traditions, breaking boundaries in culinary art.
PARTNERS.KSPA_DESCRIPTION: Inspired by Korean wellness traditions, K Spa combines authentic treatments with contemporary comforts. It‚Äôs a popular destination in Dubai for those looking to experience deep cleansing, detox therapies, and holistic relaxation in a refined environment.
PARTNERS.PALMSPA_DESCRIPTION: Located on the iconic Palm Jumeirah, Palm Spa is a tranquil retreat offering a blend of traditional and modern spa therapies. With a peaceful setting and professional service, it‚Äôs the perfect destination for those seeking total mind and body relaxation.
PARTNERS.EUROSPA_DESCRIPTION: EuroSpa offers a luxurious European-style spa experience in the heart of Dubai. Known for its elegant ambiance and skilled therapists, it provides a wide range of massages and wellness treatments tailored for relaxation and rejuvenation.

TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_1_TEXT: I had a full bikini and underarm waxing with Venera, and it was an amazing experience! I felt zero pain, which was such a relief since I‚Äôve only been shaving for the last 6 months. If you‚Äôre pregnant or not or just nervous about waxing, just go to her! Close your eyes, trust her, and she‚Äôll get it done quickly and gently. Venera even helped me with breathing techniques to ease any discomfort. She is so gentle and professional ‚Äì I‚Äôm so glad I found her, and I highly recommend her to anyone!‚Äù
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_2_TEXT: The best master Natalia!! I have been going only to her for a year and a half, and only she knows what suits me and what I need. She understands me instantly, and I am very happy with the results!!! The best of the best!! üíóüíóüíó‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•üéÄ ‚Ä¶
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_3_TEXT: Believe it or not these lashes are 6 weeks old! Natalia is amazing, if you‚Äôre super picky with your lashes like i am she‚Äôs the one for you, amazing retention, proper isolation & everything your lashes deserve is on check, will definitely be going back everytime!
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_4_TEXT: I go to this salon again and again for pedicures and manicures and I am very glad about it, since they have very kind administrators and the best masters in Dubai. There is also a cafe shop there and I buy delicious desserts there every time, all admins treat you with respect,  I recommend it to everyone ‚úåüèª‚úåüèªüí™üèª
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_5_TEXT: Always come to this salon to make my nails done and never get disappointed, this time really grateful to Asem and Madi. Also decided to try eyebrows shaping and coloring with Alesya and result is above expectations! Highly recommend.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_6_TEXT: I recently had lash extensions done with Natalia, and I couldn‚Äôt be more thrilled with the results! The application process was meticulous and comfortable, and the technician was both skilled and attentive. My lashes look incredibly natural yet voluminous. Certainly recommend this place.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_7_TEXT: Recommend that salon to anyone who is looking for professional services. They have everything ü•∞. In addition Alam and the guys are amazing in the tower. Always helping to find a parking and assist to make sure that I won‚Äôt scratch my car ü•π
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_8_TEXT: My go to place for gel manicure and pedicure‚Äôs. I had a really good experience with amazing nail tech Karina who did my hard gel manicure. She gave advice, was super precise in her work and kind. I left the salon with beautiful looking nails. I come here every couple of weeks and always return!

JOIN_COMMUNITY.TITLE: Join The SHAKIROVNA COMMUNITY On Instagram
JOIN_COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: Be part of our vibrant beauty and lifestyle community! Follow @shakirovna on Instagram for daily inspiration, behind-the-scenes looks, exclusive beauty tips, and the latest updates from our talented team. Share your glow-up moments, tag us in your transformations, and connect with others who celebrate elegance, confidence, and creativity.

ABOUT_PAGE_HERO.TITLE: SHAKIROVNA BEAUTY CENTER
ABOUT_PAGE_HERO.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to Shakirovna Beauty Center, your ultimate escape for rejuvenation, confidence, and personalized care. Nestled in an atmosphere of elegance and calm, we offer a luxurious blend of modern beauty treatments and timeless techniques. From advanced skincare and precision hair styling to soothing massages and artistic nail care, every service is crafted to highlight your natural beauty and help you feel your absolute best. At Shakirovna, we believe beauty is more than appearance‚Äîit's an experience, a feeling, and a journey. Discover a sanctuary where self-care is celebrated, and every detail is designed to leave you glowing.

FOUNDER_SECTION.NAME: KRISTINA SHAKIROVNA
FOUNDER_SECTION.TITLE: FOUNDER & CEO
FOUNDER_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: At Shakirovna Beauty Center, our mission is to redefine luxury and elegance in the world of beauty and wellness. We are dedicated to providing exceptional services that cater to the unique needs of each client. From personalized skincare and professional hair care to exquisite nail services and relaxing body treatments. Our goal is to create an unforgettable experience that leaves you looking and feeling your best. Join us and discover where elegance meets excellence.

SERVICES_PAGE_HERO.TITLE: OUR SERVICES
SERVICES_PAGE_HERO.DESCRIPTION: At Shakirovna Beauty Center, located in the heart of Dubai Marina, every detail is designed to elevate your beauty and wellness experience. Offering a luxurious range of services for both women and men, Shakirovna specializes in expert manicure and pedicure treatments, advanced cosmetology, stunning eyelash and eyebrow enhancements, professional hair care, waxing and sugaring, massage therapy, podology, and solarium services. With a team of highly skilled beauty masters, personalized treatments, and a serene ambiance, Shakirovna transforms every visit into an unforgettable journey of elegance and self-care.
